answerText: Soul Train[10] Soul Train was created, produced, and for twenty-two years hosted by this man, a former journalist and disc jockey known for his baritone voice. He committed suicide in February 2011.
heading: VCU Closed |2013 | Haverford and Michigan State B | 11 | Trash | None | College
subject: Trash
question: Question: It was "the hippest trip in America" and an important source of mainstream exposure for black musicians for over thirty years. For 10 points each: [10] Name this television program that began airing in Chicago in 1970 and become the longest-running nationally-syndicated television program in U.S. history before going off the air in 2006.
